title: SOLD: 1895 Springfield Ponies Team Photo Supplement w/Jack Chesbro HOF Pre-Rookie
author: bcbgcbrcb

posts.post_title: SOLD: 1895 Springfield Ponies Team Photo Supplement w/Jack Chesbro HOF Pre-Rookie
posts.post_content:
Good Evening, Collectors:

Up for sale tonight is a very rare 1895 Springfield Ponies Team Photo Newspaper Supplement picturing future HOF'er, Jack Chesbro (front row, second from right). This beauty measures approximately 11" X 14", I have provided a scan of the central image of the supplement which is in very nice condition. The borders and edges have some minor tears and a couple of chips and a piece of tape about 1" wide in one spot. This item is too large for my scanner so this pic is the best that I can provide. Sale price on this item is $SOLD dlvd. and the first person to e-mail me and state "I'll take it" is the new owner. My e-mail address is: [url]vguerrerobb@yahoo.com[/url]
